aws_vpc_dhcp_options.description: Provides a VPC DHCP Options resource.

domain_name.description: the suffix domain name to use by default when resolving non Fully Qualified Domain Names. In other words, this is what ends up being the `search` value in the `/etc/resolv.conf` file.

domain_name_servers.description: List of name servers to configure in `/etc/resolv.conf`. If you want to use the default AWS nameservers you should set this to `AmazonProvidedDNS`.

ntp_servers.description: List of NTP servers to configure.

netbios_node_type.description: The NetBIOS node type (1, 2, 4, or 8). AWS recommends to specify 2 since broadcast and multicast are not supported in their network. For more information about these node types, see [RFC 2132](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2132.txt).

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the DHCP Options Set.

owner_id.description: The ID of the AWS account that owns the DHCP options set.
